text: The Right Honourable Sir Edward Zacca, KCMG, OJ, PC (26 July 1931 - 11 November 2019) was a Jamaican politician. He was Chief Justice of the Jamaican Supreme Court from 1985 to 1996. He served as acting Governor-General. Zacca served in that capacity from March to August 1991. He served as President of the Court of Appeal of the Bahamas from March 2000 to July 2001. Zacca was a member of the Order of Jamaica.The Order of Jamaica He died on 11 November 2019 at the age of 88.Former Chief Justice Sir Edward Zacca Has Died ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Governors- General of Jamaica Category:Judges
title: Edward Zacca
